availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Boyd County, Kentucky, laborer. Virginia native. Married to Angelina Hyton. Father of Elizabeth Hyton, Amanda Hyton, Allen Hyton, Aurora Hyton, and Henry C. Hyton. Ferryman in Wayne County, Virginia, in 1850. Laborer in Boyd County, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Virginia, Wayne County, District 66, p. 270A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Boyd County, Catlettsburg, p. 814.
